Author: intertropical
Text: Hey friend, if you feel like you have to sacrifice your mental and physical health to get someone's attention and care, then they're likely not who you need in your life right now. You deserve better.   Not sure how to say this in a way that makes sense but you don't *need* people to be *worried* about you like this. Because you deserve someone who loves and cares for you and recognizes your pain and struggles no matter what, someone to celebrate your health and victories with.   Sending love <3
